description:
Legendary weapons for your Shu officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Weapons for:
Wei Yan, Guan Ping, Jiang Wei, Liu Shan, Xingcai, Ma Dai, Guan Suo, Bao Sanniang, Guan Xing, Zhang Bao, and Guan Yinping

■How to use
You can change Weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".
name: Legendary Weapons Shu Pack 2
